name: Cherry Tomatoes
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - vegetables category
Higher concentration of nutrients than larger tomatoes
benefits: Cherry tomatoes have approximately 95% water content, making them one of the most water-rich vegetables. Their small size and concentrated flavor make them perfect for salads and raw consumption, which provides maximum orosensory stimulation. The high lycopene content provides anti-inflammatory benefits crucial for weight management.

quotes: 6 firm yellow cherry tomatoes, thinly sliced (optional)
